description:
Inoue`s bratty little cousin Yuuki is visiting. She`s trying to cater to him 
by cooking his favorite breakfast (fried eggs) every morning, but he complains about the 
awful taste every time! Amami vows to help Inoue cook the best eggs ever, but after 
consulting with a nearby ghost, she learns that maybe Yuuki wants something more than 
just better flavor?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 美味しい, 卵焼きです.
